incompatWarn.advancedchat: EmoteChat doesn't work if "Advanced Chat" in "LabyMod -> Ingame" is disabled.

error.render:
There was an unexpected error while rendering an emote.
Please check the logs for more information.

prefix.name: Emote Prefix
prefix.description: e.g. when prefix is set to ":", You should type ":emote_name:".

renderDelay.name: Render Delay (Seconds)
renderDelay.description: Increase this option if you notice any conflicts with other addons.

animatedEmotes.name: Animated Emotes
animatedEmotes.description:
Renders animated emotes instead of static image.
WARNING: This is experimental option. This option can cause high memory usage.

doNotCheckForUnknownMessages.name: Do not check for unknown messages
doNotCheckForUnknownMessages.description: Turn this option on if you have issue with animated emotes, Such as animated emotes stuck at first frame.
